short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Will replace the newTab site with surfaces colored in design colors of the year.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This little extension will replace the new tab site of your browser with a solid color surface colored in the design colors of the last years.

 By default the color selected on each new tab is random but this can be configured in the extensions options. You can select one specific color by clicking at it in the extensions option or you can deactivate and activate the random color option in the options.

You can reach the options by clicking on the extensions icon and click options. You can also navigate to your chrome settings or under chrome://extensions and click options on the extension there.
